remarks: Part of proof of Lemma K of [Crawley] p. 118.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2013.)
statement:
cdlemk.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cdlemk.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cdlemk.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cdlemk.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
cdlemk.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
cdlemk.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemk.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
cdlemk.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cdlemk8 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( G e. T /\ X e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( G ` P ) .\/ ( X ` P ) ) = ( ( G ` P ) .\/ ( R ` ( X o. `' G ) ) ) ) $.
